values:
Nobody really gives a shit about what goes on in my life, hell nobody really gives a shit about me so I've decided not to update this anymore. Waste of my time...people only use it when they wanna leave a message saying they need me or something and after they're done using me they ignore me once again.

RIP little journal

So last night I decided to come online later than I usually do. FMC pretty much died down and nobody was talking so out of boredom I went to Yahoo(believe me, it wasn't my first option but I had read all of my usual pages...some twice). I'm glad I did go there though because I met the greatest person, she lives in Louisiana and we ended up talking for 6hrs on the comp and an hour and a half on the phone(which means we ended up talking till 9:30am heh). We have so much in common its not even funny. I can't wait to speak to her again
I feel I have, I think I'm a better person now. Much kinder and I don't pick fights for entertainment purposes...hmmmmmm
Red Sox beating up on the Yankees this weekend, so far we took the first two games...whoot!

Well before the season gets too into gear I thought I would make my predicitions, lets see how well I do

AL East- Yankees
AL Central- Indians
AL West- Oakland
AL Wild Card- Red Sox
AL Rookie of the Year- Carlos Pena
AL MVP- Jason Giambi
AL CY Young- Mussina

NL East- Mets
NL Central- Cardinals
NL West- Diamondbacks
NL Wild Card- Giants
NL Rookie of the Year- Sean Burroughs
NL MVP- Barry Bonds
NL Cy Young- Curt Schilling

World Series- Cards over Oakland in 6
Happy Birthday to me, I'm 20 years old now

The US Government has issued a new charge against those found with drugs. Its called "Aiding Terrorism" I was just wondering if the US government would charge themselves with that everytime they buy large bulks of oil from Saudi Arabia. I once again reiterate that the only reason the drugs that are illegal are that way is because the government can't tax them. If they could they would be put right next to alcohol and tobacco in stores.

Well its my birthday Friday, not one person has sent me a card...shows how much my family cares about me. Most of the time I'm not invited to their get togethers...they'll send invites for my mom, dad, and brother but not me...I'm use to shit like this by now

Well I got my cell phone and activated it. All in all the phone will cost me $40 after the rebate and its cost $40 a month...which I can make in one good deal or two lousy ones. I needed the cell though, because quite frankly I can't have people calling my home phone every 10min...it'll seem suspicious

I have free nights which is 11pm-7am EST...which means for those whom wish to call me long distance it costs me nothing but you'll still have a long distance fee *grin* if ya want the number ask me

bought Training Day on DVD yesterday, damn I love that movie... saw it at the theaters and knew I had to own it.

Are you a sheep or are you a wolf? *grin*

Anyways I think I'm over the shit in my last entry, fuck her...her loss. I'm not gonna dwell on it, not worth my time

well laters

Just woke up with a monstrous headache. I suppose its because I've been high on various things and drunk for about the past 72hrs...I mean straight through too. I bet you're wondering why I would be like that...well I don't take heart break very well and seeing as how I was left for somebody else because I didn't agree with something she wanted and this other guy was gonna allow her to do so...well she up and split. Now I've been on and off with girls a million times over but I can honestly say she was the second girl I ever loved. First being my bitch of an ex-fiance and then her. Some people deal with things in their own way, for now this is how I deal with these types of matters. Oh well I'm done now, perhaps I should try catching up on sleep

I am Ramirez; "Where there is light... There is darkness! Sword of the Dark Moon!" I like to chant that before I kill my enemies. My leader, Galcian, was killed in battle. Now, I'm out for blood!.
Which RPG villain are you?

Well I got back from the doctor today with good news. The mole in question is bigger than what they would like it to be but it doesn't look cancerous. However if it does change at all within the next 2-3 months I could have trouble. I didn't tell many people about this because I didn't wanna worry everybody before I got the results on what's happening, but all is good for now
Feel like shit at the moment, I wish there was a button where you could just put life on pause
Scary Movie 2 is fucking hilarious, for those who haven't seen it I highly recomend it...American Pie 2 is damn good also. Sequels that are actually better then the firsts, hard to believe but true

I'm thinking of updating this more often again, only time will tell if I actually do so

First things first, the demons of my past are crawling back in...having trouble with alcohol and pain killers again. I think I'm writing this more as something for me to read and register in my brain so I can accept that I have a problem. I'll never truly be able to kick these habits unless I put myself into rehab...hmmmmmm

I also came to the conclusion that me and Daniela could have had a beautiful friendship had we not fucked it up with that car wreck that was a relationship. I believe I'm about 70% to blame for it not working. Maybe we can start to mend the friendship that should have always been

oh well, can't dwell on the past

How did I get so lucky? What could I have possibly done that was so fantastic to deserve you... whatever it may have been I thank god for having you. You truly are my everything. I love you with all my heart, I couldn't imagine life without you. I await the moment when I can taste the pleasures of your kiss and hold you close in my arms. You are my heart and soul, I promise to love you forever
I don't expect to have time to be on for awhile, for those whom care I wish you well until our paths cross once more

I Remember You 

by Skid Row

Woke up to the sound of pouring rain
The wind would whisper and I'd think of you
And all the tears you cried, that called my name
And when you needed me I came through

I paint a picture of the days gone by
When love went blind and you would make me see
I'd stare a lifetime into your eyes
So that I knew you were there for me
Time after time you were there for me

Remember yesterday - walking hand in hand
Love letters in the sand - I remember you
Through the sleepless nights and every endless day
I'd wanna hear you say - I remember you

We spend the summer with the top rolled down
Wished ever after would be like this
You said I love you babe, without a sound
I said I'd give my life for just one kiss
I'd live for your smile and die for your kiss

Remember yesterday - walking hand in hand
Love letters in the sand - I remember you
Through the sleepless nights and every endless day
I'd wanna hear you say - I remember you

We've had our share of hard times
But that's the price we paid
And through it all we kept the promise that we made
I swear you'll never be lonely

Woke up to the sound of pouring rain
Washed away a dream of you
But nothing else could ever take you away
'Cause you'll always be my dream come true
Oh my darling, I love you

Remember yesterday - walking hand in hand
Love letters in the sand - I remember you
Through the sleepless nights and every endless day
I'd wanna hear you say - I remember you

Remember yesterday - walking hand in hand
Love letters in the sand - I remember you
Through the sleepless nights and every endless day
I'd wanna hear you say - I remember you

Well I'm at my Aunt's/Grandma's (Big house, they all live together...total of 8 people living in a 3 floor house) house with nothing to do so I figured I would update this...I doubt anybody reads it or cares to but hey, what the hell.

For those that didn't know I've been out of work for almost a month due to burn injuries sustained at work on my right hand. Melted fingers together and all sorts of nifty stuff...I'm cleared to go back now though.

There's one person I truly care about relationship wise at this point and because life doesn't agree with me being happy it'll never work. Long distance issues and I think the way I feel towards her makes her feel uncomfortable. Its not like I'm like other guys who stare at her body and say "HEY!" and just wanna sleep with her, far from it...I really do care about her. I see her as my best female friend and everything now, and I smile whenever I see her...oh well, I don't deserve her *shrugs*

Anyways I'm going to bed now

God her voice makes me so happy and yet I feel like crying when I hear it. Regardless I love her, and she told me she loves me...no greater feeling. I actually want to be with her and have her bare my children... I've known her for close to a year now and words just can't describe it all, so I'll quit babbling now

Forever yours Veronica...forever yours

Kati is one of the greatest and most fun friends in the whole world ^^

Work was fun tonight, another heat enduced headache...but the waiting staff already loves me...I may not speak to them but I do a good job cooking and they appreciate that because they told me they got very good tips on tables that I cooked for. Hopefully they'll tell management that so I can get more hours sooner than later :P

anyways just had that on my mind, laters all

Well I decided to remove the comment section once again as I noticed people were using that to say things they didn't have the guts to say to my face

My new job rocks, hopefully it will continue to do so

I hope the Twins aren't contracted and the Devil Rays are

I think I've become a nicer person, I know others who think so too but I'm not gonna go completely out of my way to be anymore...as Michael said the other day to one person "I can only make one person happy a day...and today aint your day"

I do know however that I have matured because the people that continue to have problems with me are the childish ones that still spread rumors and whine how everything isn't their own fault...that everybody else involved is at fault for what goes on in their life, oh well...I'm just going to ignore them...not worth my time

and that's about all
because that's where my heart is *smiles*

It happened so long ago but till now I couldn't speak of it, couldn't even think of it without feeling upset somehow...but now I can

For those who didn't know its been a year and one month since me and my ex-fiance broke up. That's right folks, I was engaged.

We met in July of 1999 at the high school we had both been sent to, still to this day I can remember what she was wearing the first time I saw her...I can remember everything about that moment...where people were sitting in the caf, what music was playing on the stereo they let us use in the morning, even what fruit was being served with the school breakfast of cereals... apples and plums, heh

We didn't start getting close till September of that year, I found out she had a boyfriend that lived with her and her family(mother,brother,sister) but we were just friends at that point, nothing serious...I couldn't have been more wrong.

By December of 1999 we had gotten extremely close and I knew I had feelings for her, and when I finally told her "I love you" she broke down in tears and told me she was so confused because she cared for me just as much now too. Her boyfriend had been emotionally abusing her and cheating on her which evidently made her feel more for me than she did for him too. Feb 14th, 2000...Valentine's Day...I was no longer at school, I worked my ass off getting extra credits so I could graduate early...I had been done for a month and it was hard to see her as much. Up until this point she had been skipping school a few times to see me and I would go without sleep for a couple days so I could spend time with her during the day and still work at night. However I wanted to surprise her, I went up to the school and they let me pull her aside into a private room where I turned on the portable CD player I brought... it was playing Aerosmith's "Don't Wanna Miss a Thing", I sang it to her and proposed with a Golden Heart pendant that was covered in small diamonds...she broke down crying in my arms and said yes, things couldn't be more perfect...was again I was wrong

Months went by and I was working 60-70hrs a week trying to save up so we could get married and could have our own place. She had started working too by this time and we were losing track of eachother slowly but surely. I found out a week before her prom she was going with a "friend" from work, she said he had gone to the school and it was only as friends they were going... I didn't wanna think too much into it, didn't wanna suspect anything and ruin our relationship... I should have.

in September of 2000, a year after we started talking and almost a year that we had been together she stole $500 from me and left the city with the "friend". I learned that after her prom she had slept with him and by then she had been cheating on me for a month...which would mean only two months after we got engaged...I was crushed, I couldn't eat, or sleep...I was so sad I couldn't cry...the tears just were not there. It went on for about 3 weeks before my friend Tim was able to pull me out of it, he's like a brother to me...

Anyways now you know, and perhaps that will shed some light into part of the way I view myself today...
I await the gloreous day when the bristles of the gun shoot forth into my head and paint a lovely crimson scene
Me and Nicky are gonna make naughty angel pornos with Meg Ryan and be rich
I am Khrissy's penguin. I live in her fridge next to the tomatos. I greet her guests. I slide on my penguin tummy and go "whark, whark, whark, WHARK!" theeeee end

Well I'll start off by saying I'm most likely going to start working at AppleBee's next week and I'll be head of the kitchen, yay me.

after somebody whom shall remain nameless said I cared for the world I decided to look deep in and find that this is wrong. There are 3 girl/women who I would date

Diana: She's perfect, she always makes me laugh and she's beautiful too. I seriously have feelings for her and feel guilty for having them because she's young. But I counter that with the fact that by the time we meet she'll probably be 17 and it won't matter

Shondra: An absolute angel, she puts a smile on my face at time when it seems impossible. I can't wait to meet her

Khrissy: My support, nobody seems to care as much about my well being as she does. I'm grateful for just knowing her

there, I care for nobody else or should I say am interested in nobody else. There was one other before those 3 that I was dating but she makes me feel bad about myself, made me feel like everything was my fault so oh well

I often wonder though if I'm good enough for anybody, I despise myself more than anybody else could for past events...and whilst I found out from somebody recently that god forgives all I can not forgive myself. I don't feel as though I deserve to be happy after what I've done... perhaps it will one day change

but at least I'll be making money again

Doesn't matter what I do
Eyes water and heart aches too
I'm a poison that must be sealed
You could never know just how I feel
Now I stand here washed in tears
Wishing I could just disappear
Incinerate all my dreams
Whisper to me your dreaded schemes
Touch me I'll do you no harm
I'll just smile...I'll just lay...and wither away... in your arms...

Well got a new RPG for the PS2 called Okage Shadow King. I think it was made by the same team that made EarthBound...its a great RPG and fucking hilarious too!

Khrissy the cute girl that frequents the chat I go to wanted me to update this so this submission is dedicated to her...yay for updates

Well the asshole who took over as Sou Chef finally pushed the limits and I ended up ripping him a new asshole and quiting. 2 other cooks are going to quit as well so I doubt he'll be Sou Chef much longer. Oh well, my interview went well today he asked me when I could start and then told me he would call me back...still gonna cover my ass by filling out more apps. but I'm 99.5% sure I got the job.

I had forgotten how beautiful her voice was, I had made myself forget because I couldn't deal with it. Her cute little laugh...the comfort of her words...god I can't handle it...can't handle if it doesn't work so I try so hard to fight it off...but its like quicksand...the more I fight the worse it gets and then I'm sufficating in thoughts of her. Even through pictures of her when I look into those eyes...I freeze...forget to breath sometimes...I don't know what to do...
alone is worth waiting for....god I can't wait to be able to spend actual time with her...excellent adventures

Working for an Executive Chef certainly has its perks, I went in to fill out an application and when they read how I work directly with an executive chef they threw me down for an interview immediately. Friday at 2:30pm...and they're willing to pay me at least $10 an hour plus overtime...I hope I get this

Mike, the new Sou Chef has a major complex now that he's gotten the title. He expects perfection from everybody now and doesn't even display it himself...oh well, been thinking of looking for a new job anyways seeing as how all sorts of political bullshit is going on there. There's a resteraunt called Christos that I'll go apply at..chances are they'll take me because I work with an executive Chef...hopefully they'll offer me good money

I've tried being nicer to people but some people it won't matter with. I see Daniela being one of them... can't even congradulate her with jumping down my throat...I'll just ignore her from here on in.

Me and my Chef are sick of the hotel management shitting on us now that its busy and other people can't handle their jobs. They expect us to pick up on their slack..he may leave and if he does since I'm thinking of leaving there anyways I'll ask if I can follow him to wherever he goes

god I have such a migraine
I met Perry Farrel and Dave Navarro of Jane's Addiction today along with two chicks from the band Kitty...they have a concert going on next door from the hotel I work at tommorow..it was pretty wild
I got my picture taken with SpongBob SquarePants... who's gonna scan it for me?

Dear Osama Bin Laden, Yasser Arafat, and Sadam Hussein, et.  al.,

 > We are pleased to announce that we unequivocally

 > accept your challenge to an old-fashioned game of "whoop-ass".

 > Now that we understand the rule that there

 > are no rules, we look forward to playing by them for the first time.



 > Since this game is a winner-take-all, we

 > unfortunately are unable to invite you to join us at the

 > victory celebration.  But rest assured that we will toast you --

 > LITERALLY.

 

While we will admit that you are off to an
impressive lead, it is however now our turn at the plate.

By the way, we will be playing on your diamond now.

Batter up.

Our team line up is:

Manager ~ George W.  Bush

Head Coach ~ Colin Powell

Assistant Coach ~ D.  Rumsfeld

Starting Pitcher and Lead Off Hitter ~ Norman Schwartzkoff

1st Base ~ Marine Corps.....Air and Ground

2nd Base ~ U S Navy Air Wing...Ships don't work well in sand

Shortstop and Clean Up Hitter.  ~ U S Air Force

3rd Base and Outfield.  ~ Combined U S Forces of the military

Pinch Hitters as needed ~ Navy SEALS, Army Special Forces, Delta Force

You may choose whoever you want for your team...it ain't gonna matter.

Bullshit, absolute and utter bullshit. I refuse to say names this time but the ones I am complaining about are Canadian. Perhaps they don't care as much because they aren't as close to it, or perhaps they just refuse to open their god damn eyes and face facts. You keep criticizing the U.S. and saying "Stop the killing", when we haven't even retalliated yet. Then you say our leaders are evil...I guess you have to be real evil to help other countries in their times of need. Hold your peace rallies all you want and stay blind to the situation...and when they start crashing 757's into your little rally perhaps then you'll wake up.

Imagine we blah,blah,blah...that's just the problem though...you're imagining whilst we live in reality and watch true heros spend countless days going through the rubble...stupid little fucking immature punk kids

by the time you stop imagining and join reality it'll be too late to realize that we are not the ones at fault

P.S. I find Tony Blair to be a very, very good leader

Well my left arm is immobolized in a sling. God knows what I did to it, but I can't extend it very well and its extremely stiff. I went to the hospital and they said it could be a few things, but if it doesn't get better then I might need arthriscopic surgery...oh well...typing with one hand aint too fun lol

Last night as I came home from work I saw numerous people driving drunk with somebody hanging out the passenger side window holding American flags and honking...its one thing to be patriotic but people are going to wind up getting hurt.

Then at about 1am eastern our power flicked off and on and then numerous sirens...I'm hoping a transformer just blew and none of those driving drunk crashed into a pole and knocked down a power line

Looking at them last night made me realize what a stupid drunk I must have been, oh well..least its in the past

First before I say anything let me once again reiterate my appologies to everybody I've hurt...we need to all join together at this time

Tuesday, 45minutes away from where I live and work everyday, 2 planes departed. These two planes carried innocent people going about their daily routines. But they also carried messangers of death which took these planes and in an act of cowardness they drove them into the financial district of America. When they did this they declared war on not only us but the free world and civilization itself.

First off I'd like to thank all the nations that have come together during this period of time and I too will be trying to enlist in the military even though I shouldn't because of my medication issues. I however wish to enlist not for revenge or to avenge anybody but in order to take part in stopping terrorism. I don't want anyother country to have to go through what we have and I want to see those who did this, those who support these people, and those who harbor these people eradicated...because they are not innocent at all.

I would also like to see the gangs of America unite. Stop the pety turf wars, as Americans all of America is your "turf" and mine...defend it...for the real threat is terrorism...not somebody who lives a block down the street and claims their street is better. We must unite

I'm somewhat sickened by somebody whom I know. Though he's not an American the fact that he has previously stood up for Bin Laden in our conversations and the fact that he doesn't want to see us retaliate and kill these terrorists because they are human beings appals me. So to Sean and everybody that thinks like him are these people truly human? Can you truly be a humane member of society and kill thousands of people for no reason at all? God save you

and God Bless America

I came to the conclusion that perhaps since for the most part I've left the net I should put up the comment section again since nobody can really get ahold of me to reply so that's that, now on to weirder things

Last night I dreamt I was at Diana's house (even though I've never seen it, it wasn't my house...Diana was there, and we were in what my subconsious labeled as her room) I fell asleep on her floor with nothing but a torn pair of jeans on so she took them off of me, put sweat pants on, and a couple of blankets because I was shivering...I don't remember anymore of it lol

so in closing I know she's grounded for something(checked her LJ) but maybe I'll give her a call sometime. She's a gorgeous young lady, sweet, smart and she has one of the most soothing voices ever ^_^ I really miss her...probably miss her the most because before I recently took my leave we had started to get close and develop a great friendship...oh well, I'm not gonna go getting sappy but that's all...perhaps I'll update again in a couple days or weeks..who knows

The only people I truly miss are (in no order)

Heather
Nicole
Diana
Khristine
Will
Mr. Rogers...he's all finished folks :(

anyways hello to those whom I've listed and I hope you're doing well

I got rid of the comment section because I truly do not care what other people think and its wasting my time reading their hypocritical comments(well most, not all). So if there's something you really need to say or ask about find me and do so :p

Well yesterday I learned that sadly our Sou Chef is leaving and taking on another job for $15,000 more a year...so he'll be making a good $45k a year. On a bright note Durand will have given his two weeks notice by today...so where does this leave me? Well seeing as how Dave(Sou Chef) will no longer be there they are going to make Michael the new Sou Chef(he deserves the title, does a kick ass job) and seeing as how that waste of life Durand will no longer be there for the next two weeks all eyes are going to be on me...if I can handle it they are going to make me lead line thus giving corporate a good enough reason to boost my pay by quite a bit more...so after all this is said and done I'll be making in the neighborhood of $15k-$18k a year...not bad at all for a 19 year old. From there who knows, but I'm wicked psyched and I know I can handle it because I've run a kitchen before. Well that's all and on the off chance that Dave should ever read this (1 in a billion shot) good luck, we'll all miss ya

First off I think my "Friends of" list should be changed to "Enemies of" because quite frankly there is all but one person there I get along with. Anyways I proved just how much this whole login and alias fit me. Wanna fuck with me? Lets start naming names

(this paragraph deleted Sept 17th)




My career is going pretty good, made another step forward in the right direction...3 months and I'm almost at the top

so in closing the devil gets his dues once again *grin*
